question: What is the name of Taylor Swift’s music album that has won the Grammys Album of the Year Award?
option4:
The highest honours in the music industry - Grammy awards were announced recently and presented to the winners. The function was hosted by South African comedian, television host and producer Trevor Noah.
Everything I Wanted
explanation:
The highest honours in the music industry - Grammy awards were announced recently and presented to the winners. The function was hosted by South African comedian, television host and producer Trevor Noah.
Taylor Swift’s music album “Folklore” was adjudged the Grammys Album of the Year Award.
